potionbrewer:Lab.NAME: Potion Lab -- Override
DESCRIPTIONS: You find yourself in your old ~Potion~ ~Laboratory.~ NL NL There are a few left over potions lying about, but you wonder if your prized possession is still secure. You check the seal on the door to its hidden compartment and verify that it's still secure.
OPTIONS: [Open Secret Compartment] Lose all your potions, take your #gprized #gpossession.

potionbrewer:WomanInBlue.NAME: The Woman In Blue -- Override
DESCRIPTIONS: From the darkness, an arm pulls you into a small shop. As your eyes adjust, you see a pale woman in sharp clothes gesturing towards a wall of potions. NL "You!" she exclaims. "Never mind. Buy a potion. Now!"

potionbrewer:IdentityCrisisEvent.NAME: Identity Crisis
DESCRIPTIONS: As you move through ~The~ ~City~ you come across a #pPurple #pMirror. NL You look at it, but you see no reflection.
OPTIONS: [TOUCH THE MIRROR] TOUCH TOUCH TO#C# TOUCH TO UCH TOUCH #rTOUCH TOUCH
